title: Vegetable Pasta with Parmesan Shavings
description: Bring salted water to a boil and blanch broccoli and broad beans, covered, for about 5 minutes. Rinse in ice water and drain. Squeeze broad beans between forefinger and thumb until hard shells burst, remove them.

title: Meatballs in Tomato Sauce with Vegetables
description: Peel garlic and chop finely. Combine garlic with oregano and egg, add to meat and season with salt and pepper, mix well. Make about 12 meatballs from the meat mixture. Place meatballs into tomato sauce and bake in preheated oven at 200°C (approximately 400°F) for about 20 minutes.

title: Pasta with Tuna Sauce
description: Cook the pasta in boiling salted water until al dente.

title: Pork Meatballs with Pasta and Broccoli
description: Cook pasta in plenty of boiling salted water until al dente and drain. Rinse broccoli, divide into florets and blanch in slightly salted boiling water for about 4 minutes. Drain and combine with pasta. Add butter and season with salt and pepper. Arrange pasta and broccoli on plates and top with meatballs. Serve.

title: Spaghetti with Vegetables, Onions and Mozzarella
description: Preheat a convection oven to 180°C (approximately 350°F).

title: Cheese Pasta with Potato
description: Preheat oven to 200°C (approximately 400°F).

title: Pasta with Vegetable Sauce
description: Cook the pasta in salted water until al dente.

title: Spaghetti with Peppers and Meatballs
description: Combine the ground meat with the grated parmesan, breadcrumbs, parsley, egg yolks, salt and pepper. Knead to combine and roll into walnut-sized balls.

title: Baked Pasta with Pork Ragout
description: Prepare sauce. Rinse and dry leek, cut into rings. Heat butter in a pan and saute leek until soft, sprinkle with remaining flour and saute briefly. Add milk and simmer for about 10 minutes or until creamy, stirring occasionally. Season with salt and pepper.

title: Macaroni and Cheddar Cheese
description: Preheat oven to 200°C (approximately 400°F).

title: Vegetable Lasagna
description: Cook the pasta in boiling salt water for about 8 minutes, rinse in cold water and drain. Layer the pasta, cucumber, peas, arugula, tomato, feta and asparagus on plates. Brush each layer with olive oil, sprinkle with vinegar and season with pepper. Grate the parmesan over the lasagna and serve.

title: Tagliatelle with Herb Pesto
description: Rinse parsley, shake dry and pluck leaves from stems. Puree parsley in a blender with almonds, peeled garlic, pumpkin seed oil, crème fraîche and 3-4 tablespoons pasta water. Then add olive oil as needed, and possibly a little cooking water, to create a thick pesto. Add parmesan, mix and season with salt, pepper and lemon juice.

title: Penne with Mushrooms
description: Cook the penne in boiling salted water until al dente. Heat the butter in a pan. Peel the garlic and pass through a press into the pan. Ad the mushrooms, and sear for 3-4 minutes. Deglaze with the wine, and simmer for 3-4 minutes, until the liquid has almost evaporated. Add the allspice and caraway seed, then season to taste with salt, pepper, and lemon juice. Drain the pasta, add to the pan, and toss until combined. Sprinkle with the parsley, garnish with lemon wedges, and serve.

title: Pasta with Crabmeat
description: Rinse and dry crayfish. Rinse and halve tomatoes. Rinse and dry leek, cut into strips. Rinse parsley, shake dry, pluck off leaves and chop coarsely. Rinse and halve chile peppers, remove seeds and chop. Rinse lime in hot water and dry, grate zest and squeeze juice. Peel garlic and chop finely. Heat oil in a pan and saute garlic with leek and chile peppers for 2-3 minutes. Add tomatoes and lime zest and saute for 1-2 minutes. Deglaze pan with fish stock and add crayfish. Season with lime juice, salt and pepper. Add drained pasta and toss well.

title: Penne with Tomatoes, Basil and Parmesan
description: Rinse the tomatoes, Pel the garlic and pass through a press. Heat the oil in a pan. Add the garlic and tomatoes, and sauté for 3-4 minutes. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Thoroughly drain the pasta, add to the pan, and toss until combined. Transfer the pasta to plates, sprinkle with the parmesan cheese, and garnish with the basil. If you'd like top with a few drops of olive oil, and serve.

title: Beef Stew with Noodles
description: Cut the bacon into thin strips. Peel the shallots. Rinse the mushrooms and leave whole or cut smaller, depending on the size. Fry all together in a pan with 2 tablespoons hot butter for 4-5 minutes. Add to the stew for the last 45 minutes.

title: Lemony Pasta with Baked Eggplant and Tomato Sauce
description: For the tomato sauce, peel and finely chop onion and 1 clove garlic. In a pot, sauté onion and garlic in 2 tablespoons hot olive oil until translucent. Add tomatoes and simmer over low heat, stirring occasionally, about 15 minutes. If needed, thin sauce with a little water. Season with salt, pepper and sugar.

title: Spaghetti Nests with Egg, Chile and Herbs
description: 55 mins

title: Tuna Spaghetti with Olives
description: Heat olive oil in a pan and fry carrot briefly. Add white wine and simmer for about 5 minutes. Add garlic and tomatoes. Add pasta, capers and tuna, mix well, fry briefly and season with salt and pepper. Add basil and stir again. Arrange pasta on plates and serve.

title: Pasta with Tomato and Octopus
description: Peel onion and garlic and finely chop. Heat oil in a pan and sauté onion and garlic together until translucent. Deglaze the pan with wine. Rinse tomatoes, trim and cut in half. Add half of tomatoes to the pan and simmer for about 10 minutes until slightly creamy.

title: Pasta with Turkey Meatballs
description: Cook linguine in plenty of salted boiling water until al dente. Drain. In a large pan, bring cream and Dijon mustard to a boil. Cut cheese into small pieces and add to pan. Stir until melted. Add pasta to pan and toss to coat with sauce. Season with salt and pepper. Divide pasta among bowls and top with turkey meatballs. Serve garnished with parsley.

title: Penne with Green Beans and Shrimp
description: Cook the penne according to package directions in salted boiling water. Heat the butter and olive oil in a large skillet. Sauté garlic until soft. Add beans, cherry tomatoes and shrimp and cook for about 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Season with salt, pepper and fennel seed.

title: Pasta with Olives and Anchovies
description: Rinse, core and cut tomatoes into cubes. Peel and finely dice shallots and garlic.

title: Spaghetti with Bacon and Garlic
description: Rinse the peperoncini, remove seeds and chop. Peel the garlic and chop.

title: Spiral Lasagna with Meat Sauce
description: In the meantime, boil pasta in plenty of boiling salted water until al dente. Drain and lay out on work surface. Top noodles with meat sauce and roll up.

title: Pasta Salad with Perch Fillets
description: Cook the pasta in salted water until al dente.

title: Blueberry Pasta Soup
description: Rinse the blueberries, pick from stems and drain well. Set some blueberries aside for garnish. Puree the rest of the blueberries with vegetable broth and yogurt (up to 4 tablespoons) in a blender. Season with chile powder, salt and lemon juice.

title: Salad with Penne, Spinach and Chicken
description: Cook pasta according to package directions, rinse in a colander under cold water, drain. Rinse spinach, remove any stems and cut into strips. Drain beans in a colander. Mix pasta, beans and peppers with vinegar, sugar and olive oil, season with salt and pepper.  Let sit for about 20 minutes.

title: Saffron Pasta with Green Coconut Vegetables
description: 46 mins

title: Pasta with Poppy Seeds and Soft Cheese
description: Melt the butter in a frying pan and swirl the drained pasta in it. Season with a little salt, distribute in soup plates and top with the cheese, poppy seeds and currants. Serve with 1-2 tablespoons pear currant chutney and venison sausage as desired.

title: Black Ribbon Pasta with Pumpkin and Sage
description: Meanwhile, peel and dice pumpkin. Peel garlic, chop 2 garlic and slice remaining. Rinse sage, pat dry with paper towel and pluck leaves from stem.

title: Pappardelle with Sausage
description: Heat olive oil in a large pan and sauté shallots and garlic until soft and translucent. Add sausage and cook, stirring occasionally. Add chopped tomatoes and white wine. Deglaze pan with puréed tomatoes. Add sugar, salt and pepper and cook for about 10 minutes at low temperature

title: Linguine with Mussels and Lemon Cream Sauce
description: Cook the pasta in boiling salted water until al dente.

title: Pasta with Tomato Sauce
description: Boil the spaghetti in salted water until al dente. Rinse the basil, shake dry and fold the leaves into the sauce. Season with salt, pepper and a pinch of sugar and mix with the drained pasta. Transfer to plates and serve garnished with Parmesan.

title: Asparagus Cannelloni with Turkey Ham and Cheese Sauce
description: Preheat the oven to 200°C (approximately 400ºF).

title: Green Pasta with Salmon and Mustard-dill Sauce
description: Cook pasta in salted boiling water until al dente. Rinse salmon, pat dry, and drizzle with 2-3 tablespoons lemon juice. Season with salt and pepper. Brush a steamer insert with oil. Place salmon in steamer and set in a pot of simmering water. Cover and steam 6-8 minutes.
